meanings.definition: A person who serves food or drinks to customers.
meanings.sent1: The servers at the restaurant were friendly and efficient.
meanings.sent2: The servers brought out our meals promptly.
meanings.sent3: The servers joked with the customers while taking their orders.
meanings.sent4: The servers were like culinary messengers, delivering delicious dishes to hungry patrons.
meanings.sent5: The servers balanced trays of food expertly as they navigated through the crowded dining room.

meanings.definition: A computer program or device that provides functionality for other programs or devices.
meanings.sent1: The servers in the data center store all our important files.
meanings.sent2: The servers help connect multiple computers in a network.
meanings.sent3: The servers in the cloud work tirelessly to keep our data safe.
meanings.sent4: The servers act as digital assistants, managing information flow across the internet.
meanings.sent5: The servers hummed quietly as they processed incoming requests from users.

meanings.definition: A person who serves in a specific role or function.
meanings.sent1: The servers in the wedding party made sure everything ran smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The servers in the company were responsible for handling customer inquiries.
meanings.sent3: The servers in the game took on different tasks to help the team win.
meanings.sent4: The servers in the play each played a unique character to move the story forward.
meanings.sent5: The servers in the event coordinated efforts to ensure guests had a great experience.
